name: blokia 3310
description:
Controls

Movement - arrow keys
Rotation - A & S
Reset after gameover - space

This is my first time trying Dragon Ruby so my entry used this tutorial

 as the starting point, and then I adapted it to function in the nokia restrictions.
I would also love to thank everyone on the DragonRuby discord who helped me out getting to grips with both the language and the engine <3

Credits
All sound effects maked by @trix from the Nokia3310 jam soundpack
Font from Dragon Ruby samples
Art all done by me
All programming was me + the tutorial
